document_data.name: '''Triumph'''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Triumph''''' was a type of [[giant]] rune, similar to the ''[[death (rune)|death]]'' rune, that allowed whoever wielded its inscribed object to inflict greater damage.
document_data.Effects: Whenever an inscribed weapon struck a creature, it would inflict twice the amount of damage it normally would. This effect would only last for the duration of a single battle.
document_data.Components: Like most giant runes, it required no [[material component]]s to cast. The process of shaping this rune could take anywhere from one to three hours and it needed to be inscribed upon the blade of a [[weapon]].
